cause.description:
We here at poetik deztruction(the band) believe that all who donate will have their name on our album, but as it is only our belief we make no promises. This is so that we can afford a panal van to carry our stuff in and extra money will go towards gas. We will travel to california then to new york then back to alberta. You're help is much appriciated.
1. We need money to get a van
2. We need a van to get to California and New York
3. We need to get to those places to get a record contract
cause.mission: give Julien and his band enough money to buy a panal van
cause.name: Support Julien becoming a rock star
